title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library('DEoptimR')

griewank <- function(x) { 1 + crossprod(x)/4000 - prod( cos(x/sqrt(seq_along(x))) )}

HappyCat = function(x)
  {
   Alpha=1. / 8
   Num=length(x)
   s=0
   for( i in 1:Num){s=s+x[i]*x[i]}
   fun=((s - length(x))**2)**Alpha +   
      (s / 2 + sum(x)) / length(x) + 0.5 
   return(fun )
    
  }



# global mimima at (-1,-1,...,-1) - f(x)=0  - d=[-2,2] (qlq dominio)


dim=30
RUNS=50
Y=0;X=0

for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-2, dim), rep(2, dim), HappyCat,
         tol = 1e-20, trace = FALSE, triter = 1000)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value
  X=JDE_R$par
  }


print(Y)
MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('HappyCat JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')


```




```{r}
print(summary(JDE_R))
```
